name: smart-setter
description: create new object based on old object and set of modifications that can be applied at selective depths

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run buildTest && mocha 'test/lib/**/*.@(js|jsx)'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add --all && git commit -m 'automatic commit' && git push origin && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Marcello Sachs <marcello.sachs@gmail.com> (https://github.com/marcellosachs)
